Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Richard E. Grant (born May 5, 1957) is an Academy Award–nominated Swazi-English actor who portrays Allegiant General Enric Pryde in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is best known for roles such as Doctor Jack Seward in the 1992 horror film Bram Stoker's Dracula, British politician Michael Heseltine in the 2011 drama film The Iron Lady and the scientist Zander Rice in the 2017 superhero film Logan.
Grant had to audition for Star Wars by acting out scenes from "a forties British war film." A few months later, he was taken to Pinewood Studios to meet J.J. Abrams, who told him he had the part.
